CashFlow.title: Cash Flow Management
CashFlow.description: Understand your monthly financial health by allocating your income
CashFlow.emptyDescription: Get started by creating your first cash flow entry. Set your monthly income and allocate it across expenses, debt, and investments to see your financial health score.
CashFlow.errorDescription: An unexpected error occurred while loading your cash flow data.

form.title: Create Cash Flow
form.description: Set your monthly income and allocate it across expenses, debt, and investments
form.error: Failed to save cash flow data

metrics.financialHealthDescription: Weighted score based on savings rate, cash reserves, and debt levels
metrics.debtToEquityDescription: Ratio of debt to net income. Lower is better. Target: < 0.5
metrics.savingRatioDescription: Percentage of income allocated to investments. Target: > 20%
metrics.remainingCashDescription: Monthly cash left after all allocations

formModal.createDescription: Set your monthly income and allocate it across expenses, debt, and investments

toastMessages.error: Failed to save cash flow data

metrics.financialHealthDescription: Weighted score based on savings rate, cash reserves, and debt levels
metrics.debtToEquityDescription: Ratio of debt to net income. Lower is better. Target: < 0.5
metrics.savingRatioDescription: Percentage of income allocated to investments. Target: > 20%
metrics.remainingCashDescription: Monthly cash left after all allocations

states.errorDescription: An unexpected error occurred while loading your cash flow data.
states.emptyDescription: Get started by creating your first cash flow entry. Set your monthly income and allocate it across expenses, debt, and investments to see your financial health score.

TaxPlanner.title: Tax Planner
TaxPlanner.description: Optimize your tax strategy and calculate your tax obligations

Retirement.title: Retirement Planning
Retirement.description: Plan your retirement by projecting wealth accumulation and analyzing your financial readiness

formModal.createDescription: Set your retirement goals and see if you're on track

formContent.retirementAgePlaceholder: When do you plan to retire?
formContent.expectedReturnRateHelp: Expected investment return rate per year
formContent.inflationAdjustedHelp: Account for 4% annual inflation in calculations
formContent.portfolioAllocationHelp: Distribute your monthly savings across asset types (must total 100%)

validations.currentAgeMin: Current age must be at least 18
validations.retirementAgeGreater: Retirement age must be greater than current age
validations.lifeExpectancyGreater: Life expectancy must be greater than retirement age
validations.returnRateMin: Return rate cannot be less than -10%

metrics.gapStatusDescription: Difference between projected and target retirement wealth
metrics.targetWealthDescription: Total wealth needed to sustain retirement based on your expected expenses
metrics.projectedWealthDescription: Expected wealth at retirement based on your savings and return rate
metrics.yearsToRetirementDescription: Time remaining until your target retirement age

chart.title: Wealth Accumulation Timeline
chart.description: Projected wealth from now through retirement and beyond

allocation.title: Portfolio Allocation
allocation.description: Your monthly savings distribution across asset types

states.errorDescription: An unexpected error occurred while loading your retirement planning data.
states.emptyDescription: Get started by creating your first retirement plan. Set your retirement age, savings goals, and see if you're on track for a comfortable retirement.
